pli-tv-pvr21:1.6: vatthuto vā ñattito vā anussāvanato vā sīmato vā parisato vā.
pli-tv-pvr21:2.2: Sammukhākaraṇīyaṃ kammaṃ asammukhā karoti, vatthuvipannaṃ adhammakammaṃ;
pli-tv-pvr21:2.3: paṭipucchākaraṇīyaṃ kammaṃ appaṭipucchā karoti, vatthuvipannaṃ adhammakammaṃ;
pli-tv-pvr21:2.4: paṭiññāya karaṇīyaṃ kammaṃ appaṭiññāya karoti, vatthuvipannaṃ adhammakammaṃ;
pli-tv-pvr21:3.3: vatthuṃ na parāmasati, saṃghaṃ na parāmasati, puggalaṃ na parāmasati, ñattiṃ na parāmasati, pacchā vā ñattiṃ ṭhapeti—
pli-tv-pvr21:4.3: vatthuṃ na parāmasati, saṃghaṃ na parāmasati, puggalaṃ na parāmasati, sāvanaṃ hāpeti, akāle vā sāveti—
pli-tv-pvr21:5.3: atikhuddakaṃ sīmaṃ sammannati, atimahatiṃ sīmaṃ sammannati, khaṇḍanimittaṃ sīmaṃ sammannati, chāyānimittaṃ sīmaṃ sammannati, animittaṃ sīmaṃ sammannati, bahisīme ṭhito sīmaṃ sammannati, nadiyā sīmaṃ sammannati, samudde sīmaṃ sammannati, jātassare sīmaṃ sammannati, sīmāya sīmaṃ sambhindati, sīmāya sīmaṃ ajjhottharati—
pli-tv-pvr21:5.4: imehi ekādasahi ākārehi sīmato kammāni vipajjanti.
pli-tv-pvr21:6.3: catuvaggakaraṇe kamme yāvatikā bhikkhū kammapattā te anāgatā honti, chandārahānaṃ chando anāhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā paṭikkosanti, catuvaggakaraṇe kamme yāvatikā bhikkhū kammapattā te āgatā honti, chandārahānaṃ chando anāhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā paṭikkosanti, catuvaggakaraṇe kamme yāvatikā bhikkhū kammapattā te āgatā honti, chandārahānaṃ chando āhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā paṭikkosanti.
pli-tv-pvr21:6.6: vīsativaggakaraṇe kamme yāvatikā bhikkhū kammapattā te anāgatā honti, chandārahānaṃ chando anāhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā paṭikkosanti, vīsativaggakaraṇe kamme yāvatikā bhikkhū kammapattā te āgatā honti, chandārahānaṃ chando anāhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā paṭikkosanti, vīsativaggakaraṇe kamme yāvatikā bhikkhū kammapattā te āgatā honti, chandārahānaṃ chando āhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā paṭikkosanti—
pli-tv-pvr21:6.7: imehi dvādasahi ākārehi parisato kammāni vipajjanti.
pli-tv-pvr21:7.1: Catuvaggakaraṇe kamme cattāro bhikkhū pakatattā kammapattā, avasesā pakatattā chandārahā.
pli-tv-pvr21:7.2: Yassa saṃgho kammaṃ karoti so neva kammapatto nāpi chandāraho, api ca kammāraho.
pli-tv-pvr21:7.3: Pañcavaggakaraṇe kamme pañca bhikkhū pakatattā kammapattā, avasesā pakatattā chandārahā.
pli-tv-pvr21:7.4: Yassa saṃgho kammaṃ karoti so neva kammapatto nāpi chandāraho, api ca kammāraho.
pli-tv-pvr21:7.5: Dasavaggakaraṇe kamme dasa bhikkhū pakatattā kammapattā, avasesā pakatattā chandārahā.
pli-tv-pvr21:7.6: Yassa saṃgho kammaṃ karoti so neva kammapatto nāpi chandāraho, api ca kammāraho.
pli-tv-pvr21:7.7: Vīsativaggakaraṇe kamme vīsati bhikkhū pakatattā kammapattā, avasesā pakatattā chandārahā.
pli-tv-pvr21:7.8: Yassa saṃgho kammaṃ karoti so neva kammapatto nāpi chandāraho, api ca kammāraho.
pli-tv-pvr21:8.5: vatthuto vā ñattito vā anussāvanato vā sīmato vā parisato vā.
pli-tv-pvr21:10.3: Vatthuṃ na parāmasati, saṃghaṃ na parāmasati, puggalaṃ na parāmasati, ñattiṃ na parāmasati, pacchā vā ñattiṃ ṭhapeti—
pli-tv-pvr21:11.3: vatthuṃ na parāmasati, saṃghaṃ na parāmasati, puggalaṃ na parāmasati, sāvanaṃ hāpeti, akāle vā sāveti—
pli-tv-pvr21:12.3: Atikhuddakaṃ sīmaṃ sammannati, atimahatiṃ sīmaṃ sammannati, khaṇḍanimittaṃ sīmaṃ sammannati, chāyānimittaṃ sīmaṃ sammannati, animittaṃ sīmaṃ sammannati, bahisīme ṭhito sīmaṃ sammannati, nadiyā sīmaṃ sammannati, samudde sīmaṃ sammannati, jātassare sīmaṃ sammannati, sīmāya sīmaṃ sambhindati, sīmāya sīmaṃ ajjhottharati—
pli-tv-pvr21:12.4: imehi ekādasahi ākārehi sīmato kammāni vipajjanti.
pli-tv-pvr21:13.3: catuvaggakaraṇe kamme yāvatikā bhikkhū kammapattā te anāgatā honti, chandārahānaṃ chando anāhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā paṭikkosanti, catuvaggakaraṇe kamme yāvatikā bhikkhū kammapattā te āgatā honti, chandārahānaṃ chando anāhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā paṭikkosanti.
pli-tv-pvr21:13.4: Catuvaggakaraṇe kamme yāvatikā bhikkhū kammapattā te āgatā honti, chandārahānaṃ chando āhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā paṭikkosanti.
pli-tv-pvr21:13.7: vīsativaggakaraṇe kamme yāvatikā bhikkhū kammapattā te anāgatā honti, chandārahānaṃ chando anāhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā paṭikkosanti.
pli-tv-pvr21:13.8: Vīsativaggakaraṇe kamme yāvatikā bhikkhū kammapattā te āgatā honti, chandārahānaṃ chando anāhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā paṭikkosanti.
pli-tv-pvr21:13.9: Vīsativaggakaraṇe kamme yāvatikā bhikkhū kammapattā te āgatā honti, chandārahānaṃ chando āhaṭo hoti, sammukhībhūtā paṭikkosanti—
pli-tv-pvr21:13.10: imehi dvādasahi ākārehi parisato kammāni vipajjanti.
pli-tv-pvr21:15.2: Osāraṇaṃ, nissāraṇaṃ, bhaṇḍukammaṃ, brahmadaṇḍaṃ, kammalakkhaṇaññeva pañcamaṃ—
pli-tv-pvr21:15.5: Osāraṇaṃ, nissāraṇaṃ, uposathaṃ, pavāraṇaṃ, sammutiṃ, dānaṃ, paṭiggahaṃ, paccukkaḍḍhanaṃ, kammalakkhaṇaññeva navamaṃ—
pli-tv-pvr21:15.8: Osāraṇaṃ, nissāraṇaṃ, sammutiṃ, dānaṃ, uddharaṇaṃ, desanaṃ, kammalakkhaṇaññeva sattamaṃ—
pli-tv-pvr21:15.11: Osāraṇaṃ, nissāraṇaṃ, sammutiṃ, dānaṃ, niggahaṃ, samanubhāsanaṃ, kammalakkhaṇaññeva sattamaṃ—
pli-tv-pvr21:16.1: Catuvaggakaraṇe kamme cattāro bhikkhū pakatattā kammapattā, avasesā pakatattā chandārahā.
pli-tv-pvr21:16.2: Yassa saṃgho kammaṃ karoti so neva kammapatto nāpi chandāraho, api ca kammāraho.
pli-tv-pvr21:16.3: Pañcavaggakaraṇe kamme pañca bhikkhū pakatattā kammapattā, avasesā pakatattā chandārahā.
pli-tv-pvr21:16.4: Yassa saṃgho kammaṃ karoti so neva kammapatto nāpi chandāraho, api ca kammāraho.
pli-tv-pvr21:16.5: Dasavaggakaraṇe kamme dasa bhikkhū pakatattā kammapattā, avasesā pakatattā chandārahā.
pli-tv-pvr21:16.6: Yassa saṃgho kammaṃ karoti so neva kammapatto nāpi chandāraho, api ca kammāraho.
pli-tv-pvr21:16.7: Vīsativaggakaraṇe kamme vīsati bhikkhū pakatattā kammapattā, avasesā pakatattā chandārahā.
pli-tv-pvr21:16.8: Yassa saṃgho kammaṃ karoti so neva kammapatto nāpi chandāraho, api ca kammāraho.
pli-tv-pvr21:18.1: Dve atthavase paṭicca tathāgatena sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr21:18.3: ime dve atthavase paṭicca tathāgatena sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr21:19.1: Dve atthavase paṭicca tathāgatena sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr21:19.2: Dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāya, pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihārāya—
pli-tv-pvr21:19.3: ime dve atthavase paṭicca tathāgatena sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr21:20.1: Dve atthavase paṭicca tathāgatena sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr21:20.2: Diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya, samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāya—
pli-tv-pvr21:20.3: ime dve atthavase paṭicca tathāgatena sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr21:21.1: Dve atthavase paṭicca tathāgatena sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ.

pli-tv-pvr21:21.3: ime dve atthavase paṭicca tathāgatena sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr21:22.1: Dve atthavase paṭicca tathāgatena sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ.

pli-tv-pvr21:22.3: ime dve atthavase paṭicca tathāgatena sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ.

pli-tv-pvr21:42.2: vatthusaṅgaho, vipattisaṅgaho āpattisaṅgaho, nidānasaṅgaho, puggalasaṅgaho, khandhasaṅgaho, samuṭṭhānasaṅgaho, adhikaraṇasaṅgaho, samathasaṅgahoti.
pli-tv-pvr21:43.1: Adhikaraṇe samuppanne sace ubho atthapaccatthikā āgacchanti ubhinnampi vatthu ārocāpetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr21:43.2: Ubhinnampi vatthuṃ ārocāpetvā ubhinnampi paṭiññā sotabbā.
pli-tv-pvr21:43.4: “amhākaṃ imasmiṃ adhikaraṇe vūpasamite ubhopi tuṭṭhā bhavissathā”ti.
pli-tv-pvr21:43.6: “ubhopi tuṭṭhā bhavissāmā”ti, saṃghena taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ sampaṭicchitabbaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr21:43.7: Sace alajjussannā hoti, parisā ubbāhikāya vūpasametabbaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr21:43.8: Sace bālussannā hoti, parisā vinayadharo pariyesitabbo yena dhammena yena vinayena yena satthusāsanena taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasammati.
pli-tv-pvr21:44.1: Vatthu jānitabbaṃ, gottaṃ jānitabbaṃ, nāmaṃ jānitabbaṃ, āpatti jānitabbā.
pli-tv-pvr21:54.1: Saññācikāya kuṭiṃ kārāpananti vatthu ceva gottañca—
pli-tv-pvr21:55.1: Mahallakaṃ vihāraṃ kārāpananti vatthu ceva gottañca—
pli-tv-pvr21:56.1: Bhikkhuṃ amūlakena pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃsananti vatthu ceva gottañca—
pli-tv-pvr21:57.1: Bhikkhuṃ aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñci desaṃ lesamattaṃ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃsananti vatthu ceva gottañca—
pli-tv-pvr21:58.1: Saṃghabhedakassa bhikkhuno yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjananti vatthu ceva gottañca—
pli-tv-pvr21:59.1: Bhedakānuvattakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjananti vatthu ceva gottañca—
pli-tv-pvr21:60.1: Dubbacassa bhikkhuno yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjananti vatthu ceva gottañca—
pli-tv-pvr21:61.1: Kuladūsakassa bhikkhuno yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjananti vatthu ceva gottañca—
pli-tv-pvr21:62.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karaṇanti vatthu ceva gottañca—
